SEARCH
Package dice

Class Dice

java.lang.Object
dice.Dice
public class Dice extends Object
Represents a dice in the game. The Dice class manages the value of the dice and its saved state.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Dice(int value, boolean isSaved1)
    Constructor to initialize a dice with a specific value and saved state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Dice

      public Dice(int value, boolean isSaved1)
      Constructor to initialize a dice with a specific value and saved state.
      Parameters:
      value - The initial value of the dice (1 through 6).
      isSaved1 - The initial saved state of the dice.

  • Method Details

    • getValue

      public int getValue()
      Gets the current value of the dice.
      Returns:
      The value of the dice (1 through 6).

    • setValue

      public void setValue(int value)
      Sets the value of the dice.
      Parameters:
      value - The new value to set (1 through 6).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the value is not between 1 and 6.

    • getIsSaved

      public boolean getIsSaved()
      Gets the saved state of the dice.
      Returns:
      True if the dice is saved; otherwise, false.

    • setIsSaved

      public void setIsSaved(boolean isSaved1)
      Sets the saved state of the dice.
      Parameters:
      isSaved1 - The new saved state to set.

    • throwDice

      public void throwDice()
      Rolls the dice by generating a random value between 1 and 6.
